cont.entity_a: Difficult to connect to the internet, with poor customer support.
Advanced features like VPN and remote access, suitable for professional environments.
cont.entity_b: VPN setup is easy, but load balancing doesn't work with secure connections.

cont.entity_a: Setup is difficult, especially for novices.
cont.entity_b: Setup is intuitive and easy, with a nice web interface.

cont.entity_a: Frequent crashes and unreliable performance, even with the latest firmware.
cont.entity_b: Reliable for smaller installations, but issues arise with inexperienced users.

cont.entity_a: Does not have dual antennas, affecting multipath elimination.
cont.entity_b: Gets hot and needs proper ventilation.

cont.entity_a: Wireless performance is poor in mixed environments. G-Only mode does not work; mixed mode only works at 11MBps unless forced to G mode.
Firmware updates frequently needed to resolve issues.

cont.entity_b: Router is outdated and has power issues.

cont.entity_a: Routing functionality is average, with misleading advertisements.
cont.entity_b: Bandwidth management feature can overburden the router.

cont.entity_a: Setup is easy for those with network familiarity.
The product is not suitable for small businesses that rely on it heavily.
cont.entity_b: Great for small businesses and supports up to 50 VPN tunnels.
Known issues with VOIP systems due to random port closures.

cont.entity_a: Hardware is flawless, but setup requires IT knowledge.
cont.entity_b: High quality with robust VPN capability.
Incorrect power supply can cause operational issues.
